thread.title: Aldi's SA expansion to bring jobs
thread.title_full: Aldi's SA expansion to bring jobs

title: Aldi's SA expansion to bring jobs
text:
Tue, Aug 18, 2015, 1:46 PM AEST - Australia Markets close in 2 hrs 14 mins Aldi's SA expansion to bring jobs AAP – 28 minutes ago Print 
Discount German supermarket chain Aldi is looking for staff in Adelaide ahead of its expansion into South Australia. 
Aldi is offering jobs at its inner-city distribution centre, due for completion late this year, as it gears up to open as many as 50 stores from 2016. 
Comment has been sought from the supermarket about how many jobs will be created. 
South Australia has the highest unemployment rate in the country, sitting at 7.9 per cent in July, down from 8.2 per cent in June. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook RBA hopes US rate hike will help AAP 
One reason the Reserve Bank isn't likely to cut the cash rate further is that it's hoping it'll get a helping hand … Terms
